mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_resource (type_id, purchaser_id, unit_price, remaining, quantity) VALUE (#{typeId}, #{purchaserId}, #{unitPrice}, #{remaining}, #{quantity})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_resource, t_resource_usage USING t_resource LEFT JOIN t_resource_usage ON t_resource.id = t_resource_usage.resource_id WHERE t_resource.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_resource
type_id = #{typeId},
purchaser_id = #{purchaserId},
unit_price = #{unitPrice},
remaining = #{remaining},
quantity = #{quantity}
WHERE id = #{id}
